name: SpeedPods
description:
Became the best Speed Pod racer of the galaxy in this high speed racing game. Unlock all the tracks and modes with your hover pod in this arcade style game. Fast racing action, high end graphics, addictive music and best of all true arcade feeling.

  • 7 different tracks
  • 3 game modes
  • 4 difficulties
  • High quality graphics

Controls: You could use cursor keys or 'A' and 'D' keys.
Press double click and keep pressing to turn faster.
